org.hibernate.ogm.options.container.impl

Interface OptionsContainer


  • public interface OptionsContainer
    Provides the option values configured on a specific element such as an entity or property, through one OptionValueSource. Instances should preferably be immutable and be obtained via OptionsContainerBuilder.
    Author:
    Gunnar Morling

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static OptionsContainer EMPTY 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <I,V> V get(Class<? extends Option<I,V>> optionType, I identifier)
      Returns the value of the given option with the given identifier, if present in this container.
      <I,V,T extends Option<I,V>> 
      Map<I,V>      		 getAll(Class<T> optionType)
      Returns all values of the specified option type, keyed by identifier.
      <V> V getUnique(Class<? extends UniqueOption<V>> optionType)
      Returns the value of the unique option of the given type, if present in this container.

    • Field Detail

      • EMPTY

        static final OptionsContainer EMPTY

    • Method Detail

      • get

        <I,V> V get(Class<? extends Option<I,V>> optionType,
          I identifier)
        Returns the value of the given option with the given identifier, if present in this container. Note that for obtaining unique options preferably getUnique(Class) should be used.
        Type Parameters:
        I - the option identifier type
        V - the option identifier value
        Parameters:
        optionType - the type of option to return the value of
        identifier - the identifier of the option to return the value of
        Returns:
        the value of the specified option or null if no value is present

      • getUnique

        <V> V getUnique(Class<? extends UniqueOption<V>> optionType)
        Returns the value of the unique option of the given type, if present in this container.
        Type Parameters:
        V - the option identifier value
        Parameters:
        optionType - the type of option to return
        Returns:
        the unique option with the given type or null if this option is not present in this container

      • getAll

        <I,V,T extends Option<I,V>> Map<I,V> getAll(Class<T> optionType)
        Returns all values of the specified option type, keyed by identifier. Note that unique options should preferably be obtained via getUnique(Class).
        Type Parameters:
        I - the option identifier type
        V - the option identifier value
        T - the type of the option
        Parameters:
        optionType - the type of option to return
        Returns:
        a map with all values of the specified option, keyed by identifier. May be empty but never null
